fr:frontmatter.fr:title: Deligne's "The fundamental group of the projective line minus three points"

fr:mainmatter.fr:p:
This is an English translation of P. Deligne's paper:
"Le Groupe Fondamental de la Droite Projective Moins Trois Points". In Galois Groups over \mathbb {Q}, Springer–Verlag, MSRI Publications 16 (1989), 79–297. DOI: 10.1007/978-1-4613-9649-9_3. [PDF]

The translator (Tim Hosgood) takes full responsibility for any errors introduced, and claims no rights to any of the mathematical content herein. You can view the entire source code of this translation (and contribute or submit corrections) in the GitHub repository. Corrections and comments welcome.
